data.title: Alankrita Sahai Wins Big At Dadasaheb Phalke Awards
data.meta_description: Congratulations: Alankrita Sahai wins big at Dadasaheb Phalke Awards, flaunts her prestigious trophy in viral snap
data.text:
Alankrita Sahai Wins Big At Dadasaheb Phalke Awards

Congratulations: Alankrita Sahai wins big at Dadasaheb Phalke Awards, flaunts her prestigious trophy in viral snap Alankrita Sahai is someone who truly gives in her blood, sweat and effort into anything and everything that he does. The actress has worked immensely hard to cement her niche in an industry that’s known for cut-throat competition and no wonder, she’s a rage who’s loved immensely by people.

Some time back, the actress spun heads big time with her work in Jio Cinema’s ‘Fuh Se Fantasy’ and soon after that, she killed it big time with her presence in the track ‘Suits You’ with the amazing Arjan Dhillon. Apart from all this, she also created a lot of buzz with the latest track ‘Mote Peg 2’ which is a bonafide hit, especially in the Northern part of the country. Well, guess what? This time as well, the actress and talented performing artiste is in the news and limelight once again. Yes that’s right.

Instagram will load in the frontend.

Alankrita’s hard work and efforts over the years have been realised and she was recently bestowed with a special honour at the prestigious Dadasaheb Phalke Indian Television Awards 2024. As expected, the gorgeous diva was all smiles when she won the award in the presence of the who’s who of the industry and truly, it is a matter of pride indeed for Alankrita and her family. In a photo that’s now going viral on social media, Alankrita Sahai is seen happily posing with her award and netizens are truly going gaga over it. Regarding the award honour, Alankrita shares and we quote,

“This one is extremely special for me and just like any other artiste, for me as well, the pride and honour for winning a Dadasaheb Phalke Award is of immense importance. I am extremely grateful to the ones who felt that I am worthy of this big honour and I am extremely thankful to my fans for showering me with all the love on Earth. I just hope that I continue to remain motivated like this and do my best so that I can continue to entertain my audience. Thank you so much to everyone.”

Well, kudos to Alankrita for bagging a humongous award of this type and here’s hoping and praying that she continues to dominate and slay in the business of entertainment. Stay tuned for more updates.

Post Views: 38
